name_ru: Черные стразы на декольте + Топ бандо
prompt: Edit the uploaded photo. PRESERVE: Face identity 100% identical — all features unchanged. Eyelashes and eyebrows exactly as original. SKIN: Remove minor blemishes, natural texture, slightly shiny. Add soft freckles. ADD: Black round rhinestones on the upper eyelids — realistic, textured, catching light. Replace clothing with a black satin bandeau top. Add black rhinestones scattered across decollete, neck, and collarbone — elegant, editorial. BACKGROUND: Solid beautiful black. QUALITY: Preserve original color correction, no filters. Sharp focus. Original dimensions.
